4314470.name: Despair Beneath the Sunless Sky
4314470.description:
WELCOME TO THE NIGHTMARE

Despair Beneath The Sunless Sky is a dark fantasy open-world RPG that will not hold your hand.

Here, you are not the chosen one. You are just another victim trying to survive in a hostile and grotesque world.

KEY FEATURES

  • Unforgiving Open World: Explore the world with complete freedom from the very beginning. There are no limits, only places where your preparation will decide whether you live or die.

  • Tactical Combat: A turn-based combat system where every decision matters. Manage your equipment, use items, and adapt to survive.

  • Psychological Terror: Physical health is not your only concern. Maintain your sanity while facing disturbing situations and morally ambiguous choices.

  • Branched Narrative: Your actions have real consequences. Choose carefully who to trust and who to betray.

You have been warned: be very careful who you trust.

Multiple endings await.
4314470.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
